lead_paragraph: Attorney General Jeff Sessions recused himself from an investigation into any ties between Moscow and President Donald Trump's 2016 campaign Thursday after revelations that he talked with Russia's ambassador to the United States twice during the presidential campaign. Sessions had faced mounting pressure from both parties on Capitol Hill that he step aside or resign.
